definition: developed or executed with care and in minute detail, work out in detail
details:
adjective
- developed or executed with care and in minute detail
= synonyms: detailed
- marked by complexity and richness of detail
= example: marked by complexity and richness of detail
= synonyms: luxuriant
verb
- work out in detail
= example: work out in detail
= synonyms: work out
- make more complex, intricate, or richer
= synonyms: complicate, refine, rarify
- add details, as to an account or idea
= synonyms: flesh out, enlarge, expand, dilate, lucubrate, expatiate, exposit, expound
- produce from basic elements or sources
